title: Шаляпин
overview: The story of Fyodor Chaliapin - a man who grew up in a peasant family, but was able to break into the brilliant world of the theater and conquered heights that no one had reached before. He gained the love of millions, but was he able to achieve personal happiness and make a choice between two beloved women? About how the strength of character and talent can lift a person to the stars and make it possible to shine on the whole world.
